Delice is a Restaurant PSD Template for different restaurants and food services. The designed is modern, clean & unique and also perfectly organized, so you can easily changes its color, text & everything you need. This template can also use for restaurant, cafe, food, fast food, pub, eco food etc. You will find many uses for this templates. The PSD consists of well-organized components - so it's easy to modify and customize everything. All elements in groups and can easily identify by the group name as well.

Template Features :

  • 7 Full Layered Home PSD Files
  • All Inner Pages - About, Services, Contact, Blog, Menu, Reservation
  • Many Features - Mouseovers, Gallery Popup, Team Popup etc.
  • Based on 1170px total grid width
  • Creative and Modern Style
  • Clear and Clean Layout
  • PSD is fully layered and organized with proper names
  • Fully Customizable
  • Different Color Schemes & Fonts

File structure :

  • The structure of each psd file is a clear and logical
  • All major blocks of pages is groups for easy
  • All groups and layers named logically and correctly:
    • for key groups - ABOUT US, WHAT WE DO, OUR SERVICES
    • for internal groups - menu, product, search button
    • elements of guidance / open - drop down open
    • layers - arrow, product image


  • All layers of rasterized or in vector form
  • All effects are editable overlay
  • All groups / layers are unlocked and editable

Instructions :

In Each PSD File you open you will find full layered groups layer with full options , you can edit them with a right click because Inspire is fully Customizable. Feel free to Contact Us Through our Profile if you need Support or some things are not correct i will help you.
